summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.2°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3719 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 2943 lux), dew point temperature (up 2.9°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, pleasant humidity levels and light winds will prevail. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather patterns to stay the same.
